notes.title: Update
notes.text:
Just this week we've got more than 6000 new users which is insane. The update we're rolling out today affects every aspect of the application - basically a big rework of the core systems.

- Notification panel rework (more info on reddit)
- Overseer: new component "Capture".
- All the buttons are now hotkeyable.
- Chat scanner and history rework.
- More responsive interface.

A lot of work has been done, but that's it for today. Stay with us!
